Evidence-Based Care

Personalized Nutrition, Backed by Medical Science

We help you build sustainable habits for IBS, Weight Management, Type 2 Diabetes, and Cholesterol - clear guidance, compassion, and no fad promises.

Looking for an English-speaking dietitian in Brussels? At Diaeta, we combine evidence-based science with genuine care to create solutions that work for you.

Our Philosophy

Why choose Diaeta? What makes our approach different?

Diaeta offers medically-supported, personalized nutrition programs for IBS, Weight Loss, and Metabolic Health - combining diagnostic insights and AI-assisted support with a compassionate, non-restrictive approach. Led by a Registered Dietitian (INAMI/RIZIV) and Monash-trained in Low-FODMAP for IBS; your privacy and cultural respect are central to our care.

Patient‑First

Listening to Your Story

We start with a detailed conversation to understand your health history, lifestyle, and goals.

Understanding Your Body

We use precise analysis to track progress in muscle mass and metabolic health, not just weight.

Data-Driven Insights

We analyze your lab results (like blood sugar or cholesterol) to inform your personalized plan.

A Plan That Fits You

We design a nutritional strategy that aligns with your unique needs, preferences, and daily life.

Building Healthy Habits

We provide motivational support and practical skills to help you turn science into sustainable habits.

Continuous Support

Regular check-ins and app-based diaries allow us to fine-tune your plan for the best results.

HbA1c −1 to −2%
LDL −20% (Portfolio)
IBS relief ~75%
Sustainable change

Targeted Solutions

Which nutrition services do we offer in Brussels?

Looking for help with weight loss, IBS, or diabetes? We design supportive, evidence-based plans you can follow with confidence and without judgment.

Sustainable Weight Management

We focus on building habits that fit your life - not strict rules. Together, we align portions, meal rhythm, and food quality so progress feels steady and sustainable.

  1. Understanding your metabolism & lifestyle
  2. A satisfying, personalized nutrition plan
  3. Building skills for long-term success
92% Success Rate* −8% Body Fat* −10 cm Waist*

*Results observed among our patients who completed the program; individual outcomes vary.

Achieve a Healthier Weight—Learn How

IBS & Digestive Health Relief

Living with IBS can feel unpredictable. We follow the Monash Low-FODMAP protocol (elimination, reintroduction, personalization) to identify your triggers and help you find more comfortable meals. You get practical steps and follow-up support.

  1. Gentle elimination phase to calm symptoms
  2. Guided reintroduction to identify triggers
  3. A personalized plan for long-term comfort
~75% Symptom Relief* 4–6 Weeks Reintroduction
  • *Symptom improvement rate observed with guided Low FODMAP diet for IBS.
Find Your Digestive Comfort—Learn How

Managing Type 2 Diabetes with Confidence

We adapt your plan to your labs, medications, and routine. Balanced meals, fiber, protein timing, and movement can help improve glycemic control - aligned with EU guidance.

  1. Reviewing your blood sugar patterns
  2. A low-GI eating strategy focused on fiber
  3. Coordination with your medical care
−1 to −2% HbA1c* 12–16 Week Program
  • *Average HbA1c reduction range from personalized nutrition programs; depends on baseline and adherence.
Stabilize Your Blood Sugar—Learn How

Heart Health (Cholesterol & Hypertension)

We personalize proven patterns (e.g., DASH, Portfolio) to your preferences. Small, consistent changes can support LDL, blood pressure, and long-term heart health.

  1. Analyzing your lab results & lifestyle
  2. Focus on sodium control & soluble fiber
  3. Practical tips for heart-healthy eating
−11 mmHg SBP* −20% LDL*
  • *Typical study averages; your improvements depend on your profile and consistency.
Protect Your Heart—Learn How

Your Health, Our Proximity

Where can you find us in Brussels?

Looking for a "dietitian near me"? Your convenience matters. We have 8 welcoming practices across Brussels, making it easy to access the best care in communes like Ixelles, Uccle, and Woluwe-Saint-Pierre.

Nutrigenetic Testing

Could DNA insights inform your choices?

Imagine nutrition advice that's truly designed for you. Nutrigenomix® tests analyze your unique genetic profile across 70+ markers, helping us create recommendations that work with your body's natural tendencies.

We are genuinely interested in finding the best approach for your specific needs. Together, we will use these insights to create a nutrition plan that feels natural, enjoyable, and effective for your unique body. These personalized tests help you:

  • Optimize your weight management by understanding your unique response to proteins, fats, and carbohydrates.
  • Adjust your vitamin and mineral intake (e.g., Vit. D, B12, Folate) according to your actual genetic needs.
  • Personalize your nutrition for better cardiovascular health.
  • Identify potential food sensitivities (like caffeine or lactose) to better understand your body.
  • Refine your strategies for sports performance, fertility, or a balanced plant-based diet.

This complementary service (€275 per panel) is an investment in a deep understanding of your body, for truly lasting results.

Decode the secrets of your DNA for optimized nutrition.

Frequently Asked Questions

Dietitian FAQs for Brussels Patients

Everything you need to know before booking

Do I need a doctor’s referral to see a dietitian?
No referral is required in Belgium to book a dietitian appointment. If helpful, we coordinate with your GP or specialist and can work with a medical prescription when provided.
Are consultations reimbursed?
Many Belgian mutual health funds offer partial reimbursement for dietitian consultations. Amounts and conditions vary by insurer. We provide compliant receipts/attestations; please check your mutual fund for details.
How long does a session last and what’s included?
The first consultation is about 60 minutes; follow‑ups are typically 40 or 30 minutes. Sessions include a health and lifestyle assessment, body composition analysis when applicable, goal setting, and a personalized, evidence‑based plan you can apply immediately.
Do you offer video consultations?
Yes. Secure video consultations provide the same quality of care and follow‑up, with flexible daytime and evening availability. You can book them directly via /en/appointment/.
Which conditions do you treat?
We specialize in sustainable weight loss, IBS (Low FODMAP), Type 2 diabetes, and cholesterol/hypertension. Your plan is personalized and evidence‑based.
Where are the clinics located?
We consult across Brussels (e.g., Ixelles, Uccle, Woluwe, Koekelberg, Berchem‑Sainte‑Agathe). See the full list and map on Locations.
What should I bring to my first appointment?
If available: recent labs, a list of medications/supplements, medical reports, and a 3‑day food diary. Otherwise, just come as you are—we’ll guide you step by step.
What is your cancellation policy?
Please notify us at least 24 hours in advance to cancel or reschedule. Late cancellations may incur a fee; see details in Tariffs or during booking.
